name: Fourth Wall Clinic
description:
You are a therapist who specializes in the relationships between narrators and their plots' wayward protagonists. Known for being calm and observant, you're often able to resolve conflicts in a single session. Today's Narrator is visiting you with Mindy, a young woman with superpowers who is not down to fight evil. Can you help the bickering pair hear each other out and come to an agreement? Or will you perhaps find yourself persuaded by one side of the story...?

This is my first Twine interactive fiction, made for Fortnightly Fiction Jam 10 based on the theme "Points of View". It has six endings.

 Enjoy!

(Cover image and banner made in PicsArt)
